mapper.select: select userId from JB_User where userEmail = #{userEmail}
mapper.insert: insert into JB_User (userId, userPw, userName, userBirth, userEmail, userTel, userRoles, userRegDate) values (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userBirth}, #{userEmail}, #{userTel}, 'USER', SYSDATE)
mapper.select: select count(*) from JB_User where userId = #{userId}
select userName from JB_User where userId = #{userId}

select A.*, B.balance from JB_Deposit A join ( select accountSeq, depositAccount, balance, ROW_NUMBER() over (Partition by depositAccount order by accountSeq desc) as rn from JB_Dtransaction ) B on A.depositAccount = B.depositAccount where A.userId = #{userId} and B.rn = 1
select A.*, B.balance from JB_Product A join JB_Ptransaction B on A.productAccount = B.productAccount where userId = #{userId} and A.category = '정기예금'
select A.*, B.balance from JB_Product A join JB_Ptransaction B on A.productAccount = B.productAccount where userId = #{userId} and A.category = '정기적금'
select count(*) from JB_Deposit where depositAccount = #{depositNum}
select count(*) from JB_Deposit where userId = #{userId}

insert into JB_Dtransaction(accountSeq, depositAccount, userId, updateDate, type, memo, deltaAmount, balance, transferAccount, transferName) values (accountSeq.NextVal, #{depositAccount}, #{userId}, SYSDATE, '개설', NULL, 0, 0, NULL, NULL)
mapper.select: select balance from JB_Dtransaction where DepositAccount = #{depositAccount} order by AccountSeq desc fetch first 1 rows only
select A.*, B.userName from JB_Dtransaction A join JB_User B on A.userId = B.userId where DepositAccount = #{depositAccount} order by AccountSeq desc
select depositPw from JB_Deposit where depositAccount = #{depositAccount}
